original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū ukkuṭikāya antaraghare gacchanti …pe….
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū ukkuṭikāya antaraghare gacchanti pe
na ukkuṭikāya antaraghare gamissāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati

original: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca ukkuṭikāya antaraghare gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yaḥ anādariyam paṭicca ukkuṭikāya antaraghare gacchati āpatti dukkaṭassa
